title: Blood Alley
description:
Buckle up for a high-octane, pulse-pounding thrill ride...Could you survive a haunted highway?Blood Alley is the deadliest road in America.Some call it a death trap. Others say it's haunted. Only the locals know the truth...Blood Alley belongs to the Highwayman, a vengeful phantom who drives his ghost car at night to claim the souls of all who cross him.A group of teens on their way to a funeral get delayed by engine trouble and ignore the warnings:Don't drive Blood Alley at night!Four teenagers hit the road at sunset.Will any survive to see the dawn?What readers are saying:"WHAT. A. THRILLER!!! I can honestly say that I have never, never read a more thrilling thriller than David Wisehart's Blood Alley."~Linda L. Roy, Amazon reviewer"Fast moving, heart pumping, lose your breath wonderful story... Love, love, loved it!!!"~lovetink67, Amazon reviewer"Action-packed! Kept me on the edge of my seat!"~Deb M., Amazon reviewer"Could not wait to turn the page!"~C. Tilson, Amazon reviewer"A lot of action and thrills!"~someonetofind, Amazon reviewer"One hell of a ride!"~Mary Romero, Amazon reviewer"Good page turner!"~chrissybsnow, Amazon reviewer"A great thriller!"~Periodical Gazette"Amazing!"~Monique, Amazon reviewer
Go to Amazon, and grab your copy today.
author: David Wisehart
